text: Ezɨ fomɨra Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazir ifavarir maba, me Israelian gumazamizibar tongɨn iti. Ezɨ kamaghɨra ifavarir tisaba uaghan ian tongɨn ikiam. Egh me nɨmɨra ia gifar, Godɨn bizitaba ian sure damuam. Egh me mongɨva akar ifavaribar amutɨ, da ian tongɨn otivam, kar akar ian nɨghnɨzir gavgavim gasɨghasɨziba. Ekiam ua me ini, eghtɨ me uamategh akɨrim ragh, Ekiam gasaragham. Me kamaghɨn damutɨ, God zuamɨra me gasɨghasigham.
